amendment.description: Amendment requires the GAO to conduct studies and report to Congress on the feasibility of using driver's license registration processes as additional registration requirements for sex offenders.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section providing for GAO studies on feasibility of using driver's license registration processes as additional registration requirements for sex offenders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibbons amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
